name: api_rendering_LightProbes
description: Stores light probe data for all currently loaded Scenes.

properties.name: cellCount
properties.description: The number of cells space is divided into (Read Only).

properties.name: cellCountSelf
properties.description: The number of cells space is divided into for this LightProbes object (Read Only).

properties.name: count
properties.description: The number of light probes (Read Only).

properties.name: countSelf
properties.description: The number of light probes stored in this LightProbes object (Read Only).

properties.name: positions
properties.description: Positions of the baked light probes (Read Only).

properties.name: GetPositionsSelf
properties.description: Gets the positions of the baked light probes stored in this LightProbes object.

properties.name: SetPositionsSelf
properties.description: Sets the positions of the baked light probes stored in this LightProbes object.

properties.name: CalculateInterpolatedLightAndOcclusionProbes
properties.description: Calculate light probes and occlusion probes at the given world space positions.

properties.name: GetInstantiatedLightProbesForScene
properties.description: Gets an instantiated clone of the LightProbes object for a specific scene.

properties.name: GetInterpolatedProbe
properties.description: Returns an interpolated probe for the given position for both real-time and baked light probes combi

properties.name: GetSharedLightProbesForScene
properties.description: Gets the shared LightProbes object for a specific scene.

properties.name: Tetrahedralize
properties.description: Synchronously tetrahedralize the currently loaded LightProbe positions.

properties.name: TetrahedralizeAsync
properties.description: Asynchronously tetrahedralize all currently loaded LightProbe positions.
